entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 5:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
